result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shaun Sal Calabrese

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shaun Sal Calabrese in court.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Shaun Sal Calabrese.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. Amended complaint filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Defense is requesting jury trial dates. State does not have lab results back yet. Court will set case for status. Case is adjourned in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Shaun Sal Calabrese appeared by phone.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Shaun Sal Calabrese.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Defense is in receipt of discovery but no offer. Case adjourned for an IN PERSON hearing.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report Received and Filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Shaun Sal Calabrese
Current: 7577 Pond Rd, Hartford, WI 53027 United States  (Effective: 08-05-2022)
Prior: 613 S 94Th Pl, Milwaukee, WI 53214

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Defendant to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  Court ordered SCRAM bracelet to monitor the Defendant maintains absolute sobriety.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription or no drug paraphernalia.  No driving during pendency of case.

Defendant Shaun Sal Calabrese in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Shaun Sal Calabrese in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shaun Sal Calabrese appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
